edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.composite

Class FilterLinesOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.grip.core.operations.composite.FilterLinesOperation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operation

    public class FilterLinesOperation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operation
    Given a ListReport, filter only the lines that meet certain criteria. This operation can be used to narrow down detected lines to only relevant ones.

        public void perform(InputSocket<?>[] inputs,
